item.title: Research
item.author: aurelien.callens@gmail.com (Aurelien Callens)
item.description: My publications Callens, A., Morichon, D., Abadie, S., Delpey, M., Liquet, B. (2020). Using Random forest and Gradient boosting trees to improve wave forecast at a specific location. Applied Ocean Research, 104. doi.org/10.1016/j.apor.2020.102339 Callens, A., Wang, Y., Fu, L. et al. (2020). Robust Estimation Procedure for Autoregressive Models with Heterogeneity. Environmental Modeling & Assessment. doi.org/10.1007/s10666-020-09730-w Morichon, D.

item.title: Who am I ?
item.author: aurelien.callens@gmail.com (Aurelien Callens)
item.description: My name is Aurélien Callens and I am a PhD Student in the Laboratory of Mathematics and its Applications of the University of Pau and Pays de l’Adour (South west of France). I am working to improve predictions of coastal hazards by doing statistical modelling. Education PhD. Statistics, University of Pau and Pays de l’Adour, 2018-Now. Master of Science in Aquatic ecosystem dynamics, University of Pau and Pays de l’Adour, 2016-2018.
